18 
19 // ProBT release version. Do not edit!
20 #define PROBT_MAJOR 2
21 #define PROBT_MINOR 3
22 #define PROBT_REVISION 99
23 #define PROBT_VERSION (PROBT_MAJOR * 10000 \
24  + PROBT_MINOR * 100 \
25  + PROBT_REVISION)
26 
27 //=============================================================================
29 struct PL_DLL_API plVersion
30 {
32  unsigned int major_;
33 
35  unsigned int minor_;
36 
38  unsigned int revision_;
39 
41  unsigned int s11n_compat_;
42 
44  plVersion() : major_(0), minor_(0), revision_(0), s11n_compat_(0) {}
45 
47  plVersion(unsigned int maj, unsigned int min, unsigned int rev,
48  unsigned int compat=0)
49  : major_(maj), minor_(min), revision_(rev), s11n_compat_(compat) {}
50 
52  explicit plVersion(const std::string& version_string);
53 
55  std::string print() const;
56 
58  bool operator<(const plVersion& o) const
59  {
60  return major_<o.major_
61  || (major_==o.major_
62  && (minor_<o.minor_
63  || (minor_==o.minor_
64  && (revision_<o.revision_
65  || (revision_==o.revision_
66  && s11n_compat_<o.s11n_compat_)))));
67  }
68 
70  bool less(const plVersion& o) const
71  {
72  return operator<(o);
73  }
74 
76  static plVersion get_version();
77 
81  static std::string get_expiration_date();
82 
87  static bool has_expired();
88 };
